meanings.def: done completely; with great attention to detail
examples: a thorough knowledge of the subject
The police carried out a thorough investigation.
You will need a thorough understanding of the subject.

meanings.def: doing things very carefully and with great attention to detail
examples: He was determined to be thorough in his research.

meanings.def: used to emphasize how bad or annoying somebody/something is
examples: Everything was in a thorough mess.
